description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fight it out with 3 friends in Battle mode of this arena brawler. Sharing similarity’s with Super Smash Bros. and Towerfall Ascension, fight on sky island and looped style arenas or create your own in the arena editor. Alternatively test your skill in Ascension mode and see how high you can climb the tower. Includes Ascension, Battle, Horde and Race game modes.
